introduction: “How I Caught My Killer” is a true-crime docu-series that highlights the real-life stories behind unique homicide cases with in-depth interviews, authentic archival material and cinematic recreations all packaged together into a fresh spin in the genre.Whether it’s a fraught letter to a friend, an urgent text message detailing a heated argument, a private diary entry describin...
